title: CCI clears JM Financial's 43 pc stake buy in JM Fin Credit Solutions
description: The Competition Commission of India approved JM Financial's acquisition of a 43 percent stake in JM Financial Credit Solutions. JM Financial Credit Solutions operates in wholesale lending with a focus on real estate and corporate financing. The move will also consolidate their holdings in the wholesale debt syndication and distressed credit businesses to achieve higher risk-adjusted returns.
